entertainment.name: 瑜瑞宏按摩足浴SPA馆(朝天门店)
entertainment.location: 渝中区光大控股朝天门中心楼上2804 (来福士广场一号门对面, 地铁一号线朝天门站1号出口20米)
entertainment.notes: Closest to Raffles hotel. Average ¥164/person (budget ¥400 for premium jet lag recovery massage). Call ahead to book evening slot.

alternative_options.name: 三间愈舍 (TRIPLE)
alternative_options.notes: Most expensive/luxurious SPA in Chongqing, ideal for high-end experience

entertainment.name: 重庆无人机灯光秀
entertainment.location: 洪崖洞 / 南滨路 (view from Hongyadong or Nanbin Road)
entertainment.notes: Free public show. Regular shows on Saturdays. Feb 15 is Saturday - show scheduled at 20:30 (Oct-Apr schedule). Best viewing: 南滨路 (Nanbin Road) near 长嘉汇/两江峯 or 千厮门大桥
entertainment.schedule: Every Saturday + major holidays, 20:30 (Oct 1 - Apr 30), 21:00 (May 1 - Sep 30)

entertainment.name: Family celebration
entertainment.notes: 跨年 with family at home - no commercial entertainment needed

entertainment.name: 太古里 evening exploration
entertainment.notes: Trendy area with cafes, bars, boutiques. Free to explore, budget for drinks/snacks if desired

entertainment.name: 外滩 + 南京路 night view
entertainment.location: 上海外滩 + 南京路步行街
entertainment.notes: Evening arrival, leisurely walk along the Bund and Nanjing Road. Free activity near hotel

days.notes: Day focused on INFJ activities (bookstores, cafes, museums) - no evening entertainment scheduled

entertainment.name: 上海迪士尼
entertainment.notes: Full day at Disney (budgeted separately in activities). Evening fireworks show included in park admission

days.notes: Shopping day with Michelin dining - no additional evening entertainment needed

entertainment.name: 舞剧《只此青绿》
entertainment.location: 国家大剧院歌剧院 (National Centre for the Performing Arts Opera House), 西城区西长安街2号
entertainment.notes: Already booked. Typical ticket prices ¥180-980. Allow 30 min travel from hotel. Dress code: smart casual

days.notes: Orientation and moving day - no entertainment scheduled

entertainment.name: Dance studio trial class research
entertainment.notes: Explore dance studios for future regular classes. Options include: 嘉誉舞蹈工作室 (Xueyuan South Road), DM街舞工作室 (Zhongguancun), 1758舞蹈工作室, 学研舞蹈坊-成人舞蹈培训. Most studios 10:00-21:00 hours, suitable for evening classes

recommendations.name: 嘉誉舞蹈工作室
recommendations.location: 海淀区学院南路智慧大厦305A

recommendations.name: DM街舞工作室
recommendations.location: 中关村街道, 海淀博物馆附近

entertainment.name: School Bar (胡同酒吧)
entertainment.location: 五道营胡同53号院内, Dongcheng District (near Yonghegong Lama Temple metro E exit)
entertainment.notes: Solo activity (girlfriend at school). Authentic hutong bar with local vibe. Casual dress. Can book table for group or sit at bar solo. Traditional Beijing beer bar atmosphere

entertainment.name: Fu Lang LIVEHOUSE Concert Venue
entertainment.location: Aoyuan Xi Lu 1, Buildings 4-5, Chaoyang District
entertainment.notes: Solo activity (girlfriend at school). Contemporary music venue with rotating shows and live bands. Check event schedule online. Casual dress code. Valid ID required. Call ahead for current show and pricing.
entertainment.phone: 需查询获取最新演出信息

entertainment.name: Indoor couple photography session - OPTION
entertainment.notes: Friday (girlfriend available). Book 1-2 weeks in advance. Price range ¥3999-8000 for standard packages, ¥10000+ for premium

studio_recommendations.name: 都格婚纱摄影
studio_recommendations.location: 珠江帝景B区西大望路207号

entertainment.budget_note: ¥800 budgeted for mid-range indoor couple shoot (4-5 photos)

entertainment.name: 798 Art District Exploration + Indie Bookstores + Trendy Cafes
entertainment.notes: Saturday couple activity. INFJ-friendly exploration: contemporary art galleries, indie bookstores, unique cafes. Most galleries free, some exhibitions 30-50 CNY. Nearby: Bookworm cafe (English books), trendy restaurants. Popular for photography. Casual dress. Weather-dependent
nearby_attractions: Bookworm Cafe - indie bookstore with English books

entertainment.name: Penthouse Bar (顶楼) - Rooftop Cocktail Experience
entertainment.location: Haidian or Chaoyang District (TBD - check multiple locations)
entertainment.notes: Sunday couple activity. Upscale rooftop bar with panoramic Beijing skyline views. Cocktails and premium drinks. Smart casual dress recommended. Reserve table in advance for better experience. Romantic atmosphere perfect for couples

days.notes: Free day for comfort zone activities - no scheduled entertainment

entertainment.name: Worker's Stadium Nightlife District (工体)
entertainment.notes: Solo activity (girlfriend at school). Famous nightlife hub with multiple bars and clubs. Supermiami Bar and CRAYOKE & BLINK karaoke nearby. Casual to smart casual dress. Entry fees vary by venue (30-100 CNY typically)

entertainment.name: ONSITEEE Art/Music Venue
entertainment.notes: Solo activity (girlfriend at school). Contemporary art space with live performances, exhibitions, and DJ nights. Trendy venue popular with creative community. Check schedule for specific events. Casual dress. Good alternative to mainstream clubs

entertainment.name: M-ONE KTV (合景魔方购物中心店)
entertainment.location: Chongwenmen Outer Street 1, Hejing Magic Shopping Centre Floor 4
entertainment.notes: Solo activity (girlfriend at school). Upscale modern KTV with extensive song library. Can enjoy solo or invite new friends. Casual dress. Call ahead for booking on weekends. Per-room pricing: approximately ¥200-300 for 2-3 hours

days.notes: Free day together - no scheduled entertainment, allow flexibility
Final day - packing and comfort zone activities

breakdown.note: Updated with Gaode Maps venue recommendations. Photography session is optional (Day 13/14/15). Total assumes selective entertainment choices.

important_notes: CHONGQING SPA: 瑜瑞宏 is closest to hotel (20m from metro exit, opposite Raffles). Book evening slot for post-dinner relaxation
DRONE SHOW: Feb 15 is Saturday - regular drone show scheduled at 20:30. Free event, best view from Nanbin Road
BEIJING DANCE PERFORMANCE: 舞剧《只此青绿》already booked for Day 8 evening. Smart casual dress code recommended
COUPLE PHOTOGRAPHY: Choose ONE date from Day 13/14/15 (all Fri/Sat/Sun - girlfriend available). Book 1-2 weeks advance. Budget ¥800 for 4-5 edited photos
DANCE STUDIOS: Multiple options near Zhongguancun/Xueyuan Bridge. Visit Day 10 to explore options for regular classes during stay
REST DAYS: Days 11, 12, 17, 18, 19 - girlfriend at school. Solo days or rest (no entertainment needed)
TOTAL BUDGET: ¥2400 for entertainment (¥400 spa + ¥800 photography). Well within ¥7800 total trip budget
